test.name: functions_coding
test.query: SELECT count() FROM system.numbers WHERE NOT ignore(MACNumToString(number))
SELECT count() FROM system.numbers WHERE NOT ignore(MACStringToNum(MACNumToString(number)))
SELECT count() FROM system.numbers_mt WHERE NOT ignore(MACNumToString(rand64()))
SELECT count() FROM system.numbers_mt WHERE NOT ignore(MACStringToNum(MACNumToString(rand64())))
